subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: M.V.P. awards are nice, but it has not ended the debate of whether the 31-year-old Kobe Bryant and all his mileage, is better than the 25-year-old LeBron James and all his hype.
snippet: M.V.P. awards are nice, but it has not ended the debate of whether the 31-year-old Kobe Bryant and all his mileage, is better than the 25-year-old LeBron James and all his hype.
